description: When using the extended server status (EXT-SRV-STS) extension, hypervisor_hostname appears in json but not in xml.
title: hypervisor_hostname in extended server status doesn't appear in xml

comments.content: When using the extended server status (EXT-SRV-STS) extension, hypervisor_hostname appears in json but not in xml.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/11681
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/11681
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/ad087405f1874259f9ac9ce34402ab3c6458a411
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit ad087405f1874259f9ac9ce34402ab3c6458a411
Author: Vishvananda Ishaya <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Aug 20 16:14:09 2012 -0700

    Returns hypervisor_hostname in xml of extension
    
    The extended_server_attributes extension returns hypervisor_hostname
    in json output, but it was inadvertently omitted from xml. This makes
    the output consistent between the two. Tests included.
    
    Fixes bug 1039276
    
    Change-Id: Ib8cd71cd5bfb65785a02085061fea5e515a0568c
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
